trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Manteca
There were no other sightings in Manteca on or around December 20th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving with my wife from a friends house at around 12 am midnight on dec 20 2012. when i spotted a bright light that seemed to get bigger it was not a plane because it was not blinking and was way too bright to be one and it started going in an oval shape horizontally and then vertically drove by a building that partially blocked out sight and then it disappeared. it wasnt a light either we followed it as we were driving for a bit my wife was also stumbled by it
Summary: bright light orange-ish color blinking and changing directions
